description:
- I`ll go to the ends of the world to keep my people safe. -
Balt places a curse over all of Lecillia,
then disappears along with the Orb.
Solomon and Levy both work in their own ways to lift the curse,
but...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: Tenshi no Sukui to Akuma no Michibiki
天使の救いと悪魔の導き
